EmailTemplate.name: OHSU-EmailTemplate-OHSU Rehire Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Congratulations! Your team member $!identityName $!application Application's Account has been successfully re-created.


Please find below the details for the user.

  • Username : $!identityName
  • Application Name : $!application


If you have any queries, please reach out at IAMsuppport@ohsu.com


Best Regards
Your's OHSU Helpdesk

EmailTemplate.Subject: New Account Credentials For : $!idName
